header.rec_loc: Parents’ house – living and dining room
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Living situation, work, food, rugby, friends, grandparents, future renovation to their house, Christmas presents.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, requesting, announcing, anecdote telling, making arrangements, telling jokes
